sentences.en: I think there is an historic enmity between them.
sentences.cn: 我认为他们之间存在着宿怨。

sentences.en: Her action earned her the enmity of two or three colleagues.
sentences.cn: 她的行动激起了两三个同事对她的怨恨。

sentences.en: Suddenly he moved up to the Alp, to live there at enmity with God and man.
sentences.cn: 突然，他搬到了高山牧场上生活，与人们和上帝都断绝了联系。
